thread.section_title: Castleberg Outdoors Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Castleberg Outdoors | www.castlebergoutdoors.co.uk
thread.title: Pamela Warry
thread.title_full: Castleberg Outdoors reviewed by Pamela Warry

author: Pamela Warry
title: Pamela Warry
text: My feet are rather challenging when it comes to finding comfortable shoes as I have a hammer toe on one foot and a bunion on the other. I need deep, wide boots. Keen was the manufacturer recommended to me, but I could not find a shop offering much choice in London. Found Castleberg Oudoors through Google search. Excellent helpful and prompt service and a good sale price for such quality boots in the colour I liked. Will use them again as the big high street stores don't always offer a wide range of choice. If only we had more independent stores in London!
